TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Calasiv, title = Calasiv, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Calasiv} }

S.FORM: Calasiv Itiniay i Laiyi Cen no Pingtung ko Calasiv a niyaro', 157 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 538 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 514 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 24 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 89%, Amis 1%, Tayal 1%, roma 3%.

Calasiv Itiniay i Laiyi Cen no Pingtong ko Calasiv a niyaro', 157 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 538 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 514 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 24 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 89%, Amis 1%, Tayal 1%, roma 3%.
